overview: Bramma is a 1991 Tamil film directed by K. Subash. The film stars Sathyaraj in the lead role as a drawing artist. The movie also includes Bhanupriya playing the role of Sathyaraj's wife and Kushboo in a pivotal role. The film was a Deepavali release, with largely positive reviews and completed 100 days in theaters & was a blockbuster
title: Brahma
